name: Elevators Amiss
overview: Maria likes her job cleaning rooms in the Irata Hotel. It isn't the nicest hotel - sometimes the elevators don't work so she has to take the stairs, and the guests that stay there aren't big tippers. But, all in all, it's a nice job; a quiet job. But not today! Not only are the elevators out of order - they are out of control! Maria has to finish her rooms by the end of her shift if she wants to keep her job, but if she isn't careful she'll end up smashed by an unruly elevator!
